text: You just received R1 Million to launch a startup. Where do you spend the first R500k?

options.text: Build a flawless, highly secure backend architecture.
Hire a killer sales and marketing team to drive revenue.
Design a beautiful, intuitive app interface that users will love.
Invest in community outreach and user focus groups.

text: It is 9 AM on a Monday and your company's main system just crashed. What is your instinct?

options.text: Dive straight into the system logs to find the exact line of failing code.
Calculate the financial cost of the downtime and brief the CEO.
Jump on a call with angry clients to calm them down and manage the relationship.
Brainstorm a quick, out-of-the-box workaround to get things limping along.

text: You are handed a massive, disorganized spreadsheet with 10,000 rows of customer data. What's your move?

options.text: Write a Python script or SQL query to clean and sort it automatically.
Analyze it to find purchasing trends and profit margins.
Look at the demographics to understand who these customers actually are.
Turn the raw numbers into a visually stunning, easy-to-read infographic.

text: Your local municipality is struggling with poor service delivery. How do you fix it?

options.text: Implement smart-city IoT sensors to track resource allocation.
Audit the municipal budget to cut wasteful spending and stop corruption.
Rewrite the zoning laws and compliance policies to enforce stricter rules.
Hold community town halls to hear the citizens' grievances directly.

text: If you had to start a side hustle this weekend, what would it be?

options.text: Building a custom app, matching engine, or web scraper.
Dropshipping, day trading, or flipping items for a profit.
Event planning or starting a coaching/mentoring group.
Photography, graphic design, or content creation.

text: When you read about Artificial Intelligence taking over jobs, what do you think?

options.text: I need to learn how to build and train these AI models myself.
How can I use this AI to automate my business and increase profit?
How is this going to impact the mental health of the working class?
I want to use AI tools to generate new art, music, and designs.

text: You are put in a group project. Which role do you naturally claim?

options.text: The Architect: I figure out the logical structure and do the heavy technical lifting.
The Project Manager: I set the deadlines, manage the timeline, and ensure an 'A'.
The Mediator: I make sure everyone is getting along and communicating well.
The Presenter: I design the slide deck and deliver the pitch to the room.

text: A massive corporate hack makes the news. What part of the story fascinates you most?

options.text: The digital forensics used to track the hackers' digital footprints.
The legal loopholes and lack of corporate compliance that allowed it.
The psychological profile and motives of the cybercriminals.
The PR strategy used to repair the company's public image.

text: What does your ideal Tuesday afternoon look like?

options.text: Noise-canceling headphones on, deep into writing complex logic.
In a boardroom, pitching a strategy to high-level executives.
Mentoring a junior staff member or leading a team workshop.
Whiteboarding completely new, untested ideas with no strict rules.

text: In 20 years, what do you want your legacy to be?

options.text: I built complex, secure technologies that pushed the world forward.
I built massive wealth, ran successful companies, and mastered the market.
I positively impacted thousands of lives and shaped my community.
I created innovative, beautiful products that people love to use.

text: A client is furious because a software feature isn't working as they imagined. How do you handle it?

options.text: Check the backend logic to prove the system is functioning exactly as coded.
Review the initial contract and negotiate a fee to build the new changes.
Set up a face-to-face meeting to mediate the issue and save the relationship.
Quickly design a visual prototype to show them a better alternative.

text: A brand new, disruptive technology (like Blockchain or Quantum Computing) is announced. What do you do?

options.text: Read the technical documentation to understand how the architecture works.
Analyze the market cap to see if there are investment or business opportunities.
Worry about the ethical implications and how it will affect average people.
Brainstorm how to use it to create new forms of digital media or art.

text: You are hired to rescue a struggling local business. What is your first priority?

options.text: Automate their inventory and point-of-sale system to remove human error.
Audit their cash flow, restructure debt, and cut unnecessary expenses.
Retrain the staff and boost employee morale to improve customer service.
Rebrand their logo and launch a viral, creative social media campaign.

text: If Richfield offered you a free masterclass, which one are you attending?

options.text: Advanced Cloud Architecture & Penetration Testing.
Financial Forecasting, Corporate Law & Risk Management.
Advanced Leadership, Public Governance & Conflict Resolution.
Advanced UI/UX Design & Consumer Psychology.

text: You are completing your final year Capstone project at Richfield. What are you submitting?

options.text: A fully functional, bug-free software application or network framework.
A comprehensive business plan with 5-year financial and market projections.
A detailed public administration policy framework for local municipalities.
An interactive, visually stunning app prototype that redefines user experience.
